channel.title: Networking "lib" [nio 2]
channel.description:
wrote a while ago, it sucks, it's not finished and it still doesn't have support for "old nio" (jsr 51)
anyway, feel free to bitch about how shit it is.
ps: leave useful feedback. pps: there may be some old code floating around in the source, if so, please notify me (old code will be extremely shit, inb4 its all old code) edit: i just noticed the package names also suck.

item.title: Networking "lib" [nio 2]
item.dc:creator: @PeeHPee PeeHPee
item.description:
@PeeHPee wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:8, topic:303023”][quote author=PeeHPee link=topic=399281.msg2962833#msg2962833 date=1253356602]

i won’t flame cause it’s more effort than a lot of the other crap around here has, plus it follows most conventions. Naming looks very similar to apache mina.

i’m pretty sure the only class name that is similar to apache mina is IoFuture, which can’t really be named anything else, can it?
[/quote]
could have sworn i saw more from the quick peek i had.[/quote]
any besides the classes which implement IoFuture??

Read full topic
